title: Ebook, anyone?
author: VD
content_html:
I’ve been intending to do this for a while, but I finally got around to learning the Palm Markup Language (or is it Meta Language) and creating an e-book out of the nine short and not-so-short stories that I’ve written over the past few years. I’ve started writing a lot more, and I must have another nine that are languishing in various stages of completion.

Anyhow, I’d like to have a few pairs of eyes go over it before I put it out there for the general public, so if you a) like fantasy and science fiction, b) read on a PDA or on your computer, and c) wouldn’t mind jotting down notes when you run into a typo or more egregious error, send me an email and I’ll fire off a .pdb format ebook, THE ALTAR OF HATE AND OTHER STORIES, to you.
